programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: When Reno locates a woman fugitive accused of murdering her mobster husband, he realizes she is being framed for the crime.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A surfer fascinates Reno with his living-on-the-edge attitude until it becomes apparent that he is in danger from a drug cartel.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A bail-jumping bank robber escapes from Reno and Bobby, joining up with her sister for one last round of scores before retiring to Tahiti.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno (Lorenzo Lamas) tries to help an ex-con race-car driver (John Beck) get free of his entanglement with a bank robber (Sam Jones). With Branscombe Richmond.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Crew: The Robert Rodriguez Film School
programme.desc: Robert breaks down how he approaches low-budget screenwriting and teaches the audience how to start their own screenplays by using his notecard method.

programme.title: Green Street Hooligans: Underground
programme.desc: After his brother dies in an organized fight, a one-time hooligan who has become a martial artist returns to avenge the young man.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: A renegade (Lori Petty) challenges the controller (Malcolm McDowell) of the world's water supply on a post-apocalyptic desert Earth.

programme.title: The Condemned 2

programme.title: JCVD
programme.desc: Weary action star Jean-Claude Van Damme (Jean-Claude Van Damme) returns to Belgium to find relief from his troubles but instead stumbles into a bank robbery.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The president recruits ex-Federale Machete (Danny Trejo) to take down an eccentric arms dealer who plans to spread war and anarchy throughout the world.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Joey, an alcoholic war veteran assumes a new identity after returning from a traumatic tour in Afghanistan and becomes a vigilante in a bid to atone for his sins.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.
